sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Suppose that \(p \), \(q \), and \(r \) are in continued proportion. Then prove the following.
\[
	\frac{p }{r } = \frac{2 p ^2 - 3 pq + 4 q ^2}{2 q ^2 - 3 qr + 4 r ^2}
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "$$\text{
Given that $p $, $q $, and $r $ are in continued proportion. So, we can write}$$
\[
	\frac{p }{q } = \frac{q }{r } = s \textrm{ (assumption)}
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow p = \input[s2v1]{}s \textrm{ and } q = \input[s2v2]{}s 
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow p = (r\input[s3v1] )s = \input[s3v2]{}s ^2
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "
\[
	\textrm{LHS } = \frac{p }{\input[s4v1]{} } = \frac{rs ^2}{r } = s ^2
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
Now the right hand side can be written as
\[
	\textrm{RHS } = \frac{2 \input[s5v1]{} ^2 - 3 pq + \input[s5v2]{} q ^2}{2 q ^2 - 
3 qr + 4 r ^2}
\]
\[
	\frac{2 (rs ^2)^2 - 3 (rs ^2)rs + 4 (rs )^2}{2 (rs )^2 - 3 (rs )r + 4 r ^2}
\]"}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	= \frac{2 r ^2 s ^4 - \input[s6v1]{} r ^2 s ^3 + 4 r ^2 s ^2}{2 r ^2 s ^2 - 3 r ^2 s + \input[s7v2]{} r ^2}
\]
\[
	= \frac{r ^2 s ^2 (2 s ^2 - 3 s + 4 )}{r ^2(2 s ^2 - 3 s + 4 )}
\]"}, {"id": "s7", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "
\[
	= \input[s7v1]{} ^2
\]"}, {"id": "s8", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
So, from the above two equations, we can write
\[
	\textrm{LHS } = \textrm{ RHS}
\]
Hence proved.
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": "Assuming \frac{p }{q } = \frac{q }{r } = s."}, {"data": ["q", "r"], "text": "$$\text{Taking terms as separate we get $ p = qs $ and $ q = rs $}$$"}, {"data": ["s", "r"], "text": "$$\text{Replacing $q$ with $rs$, we get $p = (rs )s = rs ^2$}$$"}, {"data": ["r"], "text": "$$\text{Dividing the above equations by $ r $, we get $\frac{p }{r } = \frac{rs ^2}{r } = s ^2$}$$"}, {"data": ["p", 4], "text": "$$\text{Replacing $p$ with $(rs^2)$, and $q$ with $(rs)$, we get $\frac{2 (rs ^2)^2 - 3 (rs ^2)rs + 4 (rs )^2}{2 (rs )^2 - 3 (rs )r + 4 r ^2}$}$$"}, {"data": [3, 4], "text": "$$\text{Upon simplifying the previous equation by opening up the brackets we get $\textrm{RHS } = \frac{r ^2 s ^2 (2 s ^2 - 3 s + 4 )}{r ^2(2 s ^2 - 3 s + 4 )}$}$$"}, {"data": ["s"], "text": "$$\text{The previous equation can be written as $s ^2$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
